header.title: CourseMatch
header.infoText: CourseMatch is a recommender system based on the word embedding technique for course selection. It matches the user's course search with a database of course descriptions available through the Aalto API, and suggest the most relevant courses.

mainScreen.courseCodeDescription: Pick a course from the list to get the most matched courses.
mainScreen.examplesTitle: Ask anything or try an example
examples: Explain quantum computing in simple terms
I want to learn how to program a robot
Introduction to the stock market and trading
limitations: Only courses taught in English are included in the search
Accepts only English text for the search
